channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Dozens of Chinese Military Boats and Planes Around Taiwan
item.description: The defense ministry says 62 Chinese aircraft and 27 warships were recorded around the country as China wrapped up drills around Taiwan.

item.title: Taiwan to Use Soft Power on Sidelines of WHA
item.description: Taiwan is sending a delegation to Geneva for the World Health Assembly, even though it wasn't invited.

item.title: Guatemala President Says Taiwan Ties Behind China's Trade Block
item.description: Guatemalan President Bernardo Arevalo says that China rejected entry of some shipments from his country, speculating that it could be due to Guatemala's diplomatic relationship wit

item.title: Knife Attack Kills One and Leaves Two Injured
item.description: Police are investigating a knife attack in which the suspected attacker injured two men before turning the knife on himself and dying by suicide.
